mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, fileSize, downCount, regdate FROM board_file ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, downCount, regdate) VALUES(board_file_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{downCount}, SYSDATE)
